description:
Mandiant says it has no evidence to suggest that unauthorized access to Snowflake customer accounts stemmed from a breach of Snowflake's enterprise environment.

The post Snowflake Attacks: Mandiant Links Data Breaches to Infostealer Infections appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Snowflake Attacks: Mandiant Links Data Breaches to Infostealer Infections

description:
Fortinet announces plans to acquire Lacework, a late-stage cloud security startup that was once listed as a “unicorn” company valued north of $1 billion.

The post Fortinet Expands Cloud Security Portfolio with Lacework Acquisition appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Fortinet Expands Cloud Security Portfolio with Lacework Acquisition

description:
A critical vulnerability in the PyTorch distributed RPC framework could be exploited for remote code execution.

The post Critical PyTorch Vulnerability Can Lead to Sensitive AI Data Theft appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Critical PyTorch Vulnerability Can Lead to Sensitive AI Data Theft

description:
PHP has released patches for CVE-2024-4577, a critical vulnerability that could lead to arbitrary code execution on remote servers.

The post PHP Patches Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: PHP Patches Critical Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

description:
The New York Times has issued a statement after someone leaked source code allegedly belonging to the news giant. 

The post New York Times Responds to Source Code Leak appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: New York Times Responds to Source Code Leak

description:
Nvidia patches multiple high-severity vulnerabilities in GPU display drivers and virtual GPU software.

The post Nvidia Patches High-Severity GPU Driver Vulnerabilities appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Nvidia Patches High-Severity GPU Driver Vulnerabilities

description:
Cisco Talos researchers have found over a dozen vulnerabilities in AutomationDirect PLCs, including flaws that could be valuable to attackers.

The post Cisco Finds 15 Vulnerabilities in AutomationDirect PLCs appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Cisco Finds 15 Vulnerabilities in AutomationDirect PLCs

description:
A Zambian court has sentenced 22 Chinese nationals to long prison terms for cybercrimes that included internet fraud and online scams targeting Zambians and other people.

The post 22 Chinese Nationals Sentenced to Long Prison Terms in Zambia for Multinational Cybercrimes appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: 22 Chinese Nationals Sentenced to Long Prison Terms in Zambia for Multinational Cybercrimes

description:
Auction house Christie's says the data breach caused by the recent ransomware attack impacts the information of 45,000 individuals.

The post Christie’s Says Ransomware Attack Impacts 45,000 People appeared first on SecurityWeek.
title: Christie’s Says Ransomware Attack Impacts 45,000 People
